quote: What do you think?” she softly whispered. “I think I want nothing more than to please you.” He whispered back while pulling her down to the bed. She looked at him with wanting and hunger.
quote_letters: WHAT DO YOU THINK SHE SOFTLY WHISPERED I THINK I WANT NOTHING MORE THAN TO PLEASE YOU HE WHISPERED BACK WHILE PULLING HER DOWN TO THE BED SHE LOOKED AT HIM WITH WANTING AND HUNGER
